      static java.lang.Integer count​(java.io.File file, java.util.List<ProjectDependency> dependencyBlacklist)

      This method collects all import statements recursively across all java files from an entrypoint and tries to assign them to the project dependencies

      • collectAllApplicationStartupLibrariesOfProject

        public static java.util.List<org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact> collectAllApplicationStartupLibrariesOfProject​(java.nio.file.Path springBootApp,
                                                                                                                  java.io.File inputProject,
                                                                                                                  java.io.File mavenRepo)
        This method creates a java context based on the @SpringBootApplication class and returns the loaded dependencies
        Parameters:
        springBootApp - Path of the @SpringBootApplication class
        inputProject - Location of the project
        mavenRepo - Location of the local maven repository
        Returns:
        List with dependencies

      • getFQN

        public static java.lang.String getFQN​(java.nio.file.Path inputFile)
        This method is traversing parent folders until it reaches java folder in order to get the FQN
        Parameters:
        inputFile - Java input file to retrieve FQN (Full Qualified Name)
        Returns:
        qualified name with full package

      • occurrenceMeasurement

        public static java.lang.Integer occurrenceMeasurement​(java.io.File entryPoint,
                                                      java.util.List<ProjectDependency> dependencyBlacklist,
                                                      java.util.List<ProjectDependency> projectDependencies,
                                                      java.util.List<org.eclipse.aether.graph.DependencyNode> dependencyTreeRootNodes)
        This method collects all import statements recursively across all java files from an entrypoint and tries to assign them to the project dependencies
        Parameters:
        entryPoint - Directory as entrypoint
        dependencyBlacklist - List with the blacklisted dependencies
        projectDependencies - List of the project dependencies
        dependencyTreeRootNodes - Dependency tree
        Returns:
        Total files scanned

      • count

        public static java.lang.Integer count​(java.io.File file,
                                      java.util.List<ProjectDependency> dependencyBlacklist)
        This method searches for import statements in a source code file, tries to assign them to a project dependency and increments the occurrence counter of the associated dependency
        Parameters:
        file - Java source code file
        dependencyBlacklist - List of the project dependencies
        Returns:
        Total files scanned
